name.ja: <ruby>騎士皇<rt>センチュリオン</rt></ruby>レガーティア

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Your monsters with 2000 or less ATK cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Centurion Legatia" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can draw 1 card, then you can destroy the 1 monster your opponent controls with the highest ATK (your choice, if tied). During the End Phase: You can place 1 non-Synchro "Centurion" monster from your hand or GY face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap.
